summary.para: Sets the background color of the preview handler.

param.name: color
param.para: A value of type COLORREF to use for the preview handler background.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: Note These are suggestions. It is not compulsory for this method to be called. The preview handlers must be able to make their own decisions.

summary.para: Sets the font attributes to be used for text within the preview handler.

param.name: plf
param.para: A pointer to a LOGFONTW Structure containing the necessary attributes for the font to use.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: Note These are suggestions. It is not compulsory for this method to be called. The preview handlers must be able to make their own decisions.

summary.para: Sets the color of the text within the preview handler.

param.name: color
param.para: A value of type COLORREF to use for the preview handler text color.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: Note These are suggestions. It is not compulsory for this method to be called; the preview handlers must be able to make their own decisions.
